text: An amor asteroid is a group of asteroids found near Earth that were named after 1221 Amor. While some other kinds of asteroids cross over Mars' and Earth's orbits, nearly all of the amor asteroids do not. The best known amor asteroid is 433 Eros. It circled around and landed upon by the NEAR Shoemaker. About 1,200 of all the asteroids in space are amor asteroids, with about 200 of them numbered, or given a number. Only 50 amor asteroids are named. == Some notable amor asteroids == The following are a few of the most notable amor asteroids, in reverse order of discovery: Name Year Discoverer 3908 Nyx 1980 Hans-Emil Schuster 1221 Amor 1932 Eug√®ne Joseph Delporte 1036 Ganymed 1924 Walter Baade 887 Alinda 1918 Max Wolf 719 Albert 1911 Johann Palisa 433 Eros 1898 Gustav Witt ==Related pages== * List of named Amor asteroids == Other websites == * List of Amor minor planets *
title: Amor asteroid
